duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and analyze disability claims to identify potential candidates for vocational case management services.
Review accommodation event requests and support customers through an interactive process for successful accommodation outcomes.
Provide consultative service to clarify vocational and/or medical information to assist Claims teams.
Develop and implement comprehensive vocational and/or accommodation plans to assist customers in return-to-work and/or stay-at-work process.
Collaborate daily with claims specialists, managers, nurses, behavioral health specialists, and physicians to review medical documentation and provide recommendations for disability.
Engage with customers to positively impact their lives through return-to-work and stay-at-work plans.
Communicate efficiently and professionally with a varied audience using email, telephone, and written correspondence.

education_certification.credential: Master’s Degree in Rehabilitation Counseling or related field
